page.title: 05VILLAGE NEWS
page.content: Ockham keeps informed with four TV channels and information pages, Tele- text and Prestel Service, telephone, two daily postal deliveries,radio (including CB) and daily deliveries of newspapers and magazines. A mobile library calls weekly. The Village Notice Board carries news of loacl activities and organisations. In church, notice of meetings, bellringing etc , is given verbally. News is spread through gatherings, play groups, coffee mornings and parties. The Parish Room is fully let for Jumble Sales, Parish Council meetings and social activities which keep people informed.
